place_of_publication.publication_title: in W. H. Brewer et al., Bot. California

treatment.description: Plants mostly 1–2 dm. Stems arching upward. Leaves (smaller and fewer distally) usually smaller than 4 × 2 cm, bases not clasping, margins toothed or subentire. Heads 2–4(–5). Phyllaries (± 8) ± 13, 5–7(–8) mm.
treatment.discussion: Plants of var. occidentalis grow in the southern Cascade Mountains and the Sierra Nevada.
